T02D2844:183a-0: @183a * // spyan ras gzigs me'i lha la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2844:183a-1: de nas me lha'i gtso bo sbyin sreg mnyes //
T02D2844:183a-2: zhes 'byung ba'i sgrub thabs bshad par bya'o //
T02D2844:183a-3: 'bar ba'i dbus na brjid pa'i sku //
T02D2844:183a-5: dmar ba'i 'od kyis gdug pa bsreg / sgrub po'i
T02D2844:183a-6: don mdzad rgyal gyur cig / sdig pa gzhig dang
T02D2844:183a-7: dpal bskyed phyir // las kun sgrub par byed pa'i rgyu //
T02D2844:183a-8: me yi las ni phyogs gnyis la //
T02D2844:183a-9: mkhas pas 'bad de rnam par brtag / padmo lta bu'i thab dkar mdzes //
T02D2844:183a-10: khru bzhi khru gsum khru gang tshad //
T02D2844:183a-11: zlum po rgya phyed slar brus pa //
T02D2844:183a-12: sor bzhi phyir bskyod byi dor byug / kha khyer stegs ngos padma dang //
T02D2844:183a-13: rin chen dra ba dra ba phyed //
T02D2844:183a-15: sgo bzhir bcas dang pho brang nyid //
T02D2844:183a-17: bkra shis phyed pa'i yam shing tshad //
T02D2844:183a-18: ci rigs dri zhim sngags byugs la //
T02D2844:183a-19: bsangs nas gtor ma sngon 'gro bas //
T02D2844:183b-0: rol mo @183b mkhan dang me tog brgyud //
T02D2844:183b-1: bram ze'i khyim nas blangs pa'am //
T02D2844:183b-2: yang na rdo rje yam shing la stsal me //
T02D2844:183b-3: bsil yab kyis ni g-yabs te sbar //
T02D2844:183b-4: mar dang til dang 'bras dang nas //
T02D2844:183b-5: me tog sman dang 'bras bu sbrang //
T02D2844:183b-6: zho zan yungs kar d'ur ba shing //
T02D2844:183b-7: mthar byed sngags kyis bsang bar bya //
T02D2844:183b-8: aarga la sogs byin brlabs la //
T02D2844:183b-9: lha yi sbyor bas me lha bskyed //
T02D2844:183b-10: me dang yo byad yam shing sbyangs //
T02D2844:183b-11: ye shes bkug pa dbul bar bya //
T02D2844:183b-14: aom badzra sarba p'a pam da ha na badzra sv'a h'a /
T02D2844:183b-16: aom badzra pushta ye sv'a h'a /
T02D2844:183b-18: aom badzra san tushta na ye sv'ah'a /
T02D2844:183b-20: aom badzra nir by'a di sv'a h'a /
T02D2844:183b-22: aom badzra sarba pha la ye sv'a h'a /
T02D2844:183b-24: aom badzra aa nu smri te sv'a h'a /
T02D2844:183b-26: aom badzra sam ba de sv'a h'a /
T02D2844:183b-30: aom badzra a'a yu she sv'a h'a /
T02D2844:183b-32: aom badzra bo dhi briksha ye sv'a h'a /
T02D2844:183b-34: aom a'a:hr'i:na ma:sa manta buddh'a n'am aom aagna ye aa
T02D2844:183b-35: mu ka sya sarba karma siddhi ku ru sv'a h'a
T02D2844:183b-36: / bsreg rdzas thams cad kyi mgo'am mjug du dgang blugs dbul ba'o //
T02D2844:183b-37: gzhan yang mchod pa thams cad kyang //
T02D2844:183b-38: ci rigs mkhas pas shes byas te //
T02D2844:183b-39: dgang dang blugs ba'i phyag rgya yis //
T02D2844:183b-40: mnyes byas khrus dang bcas pas mchod //
T02D2844:183b-41: mthar bzod par gsol ba dngos grub blangs la gshegs
T02D2844:183b-42: su gsol nas bde ba la reg par gnas pa
